title: Forward const declaration inside method not allowed
body:
by **trolleriprofessorn**: 
The following program doesn't compile

package main

func main() {
	const a = b + 1
	const b = 1
}

The error message is "undefined: b".

It seems the program could, and perhaps should, be legal.

Which version are you using?
go version devel +f6172d444cc0 Wed Jan 30 02:53:56 2013 -0800 linux/amd64
